source_setting.source: select `uuid`, `patent_id`, `sequence`, `name_first`, `name_last`, `organization`, `applicant_type`, `applicant_authority`, `patent_title`, `abstract`, `patent_date`, `subsection_id`, `subsection_title`, `city`, `state`, `country` from {elastic_production_source}.rawapplicants where uuid > '{{offset}}' order by uuid limit {{limit}};
